customer_addr:
9930 Bluebird Street N W Apt #309
MINNEAPOLIS, MN 55433

citations.narrative:
Attempted to conduct an inspection. The calling system at the apartment complex stated that the contact number was no
longer in service indicating that the registrant was no longer located at this address. There is no indication in our database
that the Deputy Administrator was notified of the change in operation. Failure to notify the Deputy Administrator of
changes in operations does not allow for APHIS Officials to conduct inspections for compliance with the Animal Welfare
Act. Notify the Deputy Administrator of the current business address. Correct by: 9 July 2021

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:25 PM. Dialed the
number for the registrant's location at the building complex, system stated the number was no longer in service.
Additional Inspectors:
KIMBERLY MILLER, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section

narrative:
2.27(a) 
   
Notification of change of operation. 
Attempted to conduct an inspection. The calling system at the apartment complex stated that the contact number was no 
longer in service indicating that the registrant was no longer located at this address. There is no indication in our database 
that the Deputy Administrator was notified of the change in operation. Failure to notify the Deputy Administrator of 
changes in operations does not allow for APHIS Officials to conduct inspections for compliance with the Animal Welfare 
Act. Notify the Deputy Administrator of the current business address. Correct by: 9 July 2021 
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:25 PM. Dialed the 
number for the registrant's location at the building complex, system stated the number was no longer in service.
